Title: Engagement Survey 1
Description: This short survey seeks to measure the impact that this article had on you.

Q1.Question: Can you give a summary of what this article was about?

Q2.Question: How did this article make you feel?

Q3.Question: Did you learn anything new from this article? If yes, state what, if no, write no

Q4.Question: Would you recommend this article to a friend or family member?

Q5.Question: Did you agree with the point of few of this article?
